summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of Telegram Sushi Bot. All database operations, CRUD functionality, cart operations, order management, admin operations, and notification receiver management are working correctly.
passed_tests: Init Test Data - Created 6 categories and 10 products as expected
Category CRUD Operations - Create, read, update, delete categories and subcategories
Product CRUD Operations - Create, read, update, delete products
User Operations - Create and manage user accounts
Cart Operations - Add, update, remove items from cart, clear cart
Order Operations - Create orders with sequential order numbers
Admin Operations - Add, remove, check admin status
Notification Receiver Operations - Add, remove notification receivers
Order Number Counter - Sequential order numbering working correctly
success_percentage: backend: 100% (10/10 tests passed), frontend: N/A (Telegram bot - no web frontend)
